plot: Honoria Smythe-Smith is:A) a really bad violinist B) still miffed at being nicknamed "Bug" as a childC) not in love with her older brother's best friendD) all of the aboveMarcus Holroyd is:A) the Earl of ChatterisB) regrettably prone to sprained anklesC) not in love with his best friend's younger sisterD) all of the aboveTogether they:A) eat quite a bit of chocolate cakeB) survive a deadly fever and the world's worst musical performanceC) fall quite desperately in loveIt's Julia Quinn at her best, so you know the answer is . . .D) all of the above
